description: E.g.f. cos(arctan(x)+arcsin(x)) = ((1-x^2)^(1/2) - x^2)/(1+x^2)^(1/2), even powers only.
mathematica: mx = 13; Delete[ Range[0, 2 mx]! CoefficientList[ Series[ (Sqrt[1 - x^2] - x^2)/Sqrt[1 + x^2], {x, 0, 2 mx}], x], Split[2 Range@ mx]] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Oct 22 2012 *)
author: Patrick Demichel (patrick.demichel(AT)hp.com)
extensions: Name corrected, and e.g.f. simplified by _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_ and _Joerg Arndt_, Oct 23 2012.
